addon.name: Script Inject
addon.description: An easy way to add global content, metas, styles, scripts, and more into your store(s) theme using head, body, and footer hooks.

item.name:
Head global meta inject
(index.meta.post)
item.tooltip: Puts meta information into the <head> section of your store(s). Note: You may need to surround certain metas or JSON-LD with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.

item.name:
Head global style inject
(index.styles.post)
item.tooltip: Puts styles into the <head> section of your store(s). CS-Cart loops these into standalone.css.

item.name:
Head global script inject
(index.head_scripts.post)
item.tooltip: Puts scripts into the <head> section of your store(s). Note: You may need to surround your script(s) with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.

item.name:
Body global inject
(index.content.pre)
item.tooltip: Puts scripts or content just after the <body> tag of your store(s). Note: inline scripts may be moved to the footer automagically unless you include data-no-defer attrib. You may need to surround your script(s) with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.

item.name:
Footer global inject
(index.footer.post)
item.tooltip: Puts scripts or content into the footer of your store(s). Note: inline scripts may be moved to the footer automagically unless you include data-no-defer attrib. You may need to surround your script(s) with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.

item.name:
Footer global script inject
(index.scripts.post)
item.tooltip: Puts scripts into the footer of your store(s). Note: You may need to surround your script(s) with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.

item.name:
Order success footer inject
()
item.tooltip: Puts scripts into the order complete of your store(s). Note: inline scripts may be moved to the footer automagically unless you include data-no-defer attrib. You may need to surround your script(s) with {literal}{/literal} Smarty tags.
